import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import axiosInstance from '../../baseurl' function ViewProgramTutorials() { const {id} = useParams() useEffect(()=>{ axiosInstance.post(`/viewTutorialRequestsByPgmId/${id}`) .then((res)=>{console.log(res," Tutorial request list");}) .catch((err)=>{console.log(err,'error tutorial req list');}) axiosInstance.post(`/viewtutorialByPgmId/${id}`) .then((res)=>{console.log(res, 'approved tutorials');}) .catch((err)=>{console.log(err, 'approved tutorial error');}) },[]) return (

{approvedpg.length ? approvedpg.map((a) => { return (
{a.title}

{a.category}, {a.description}

View Program
); }) : null}

) } export default ViewProgramTutorials
